verses.roman:
ei-mata haila kṛṣṇera rathe ārohaṇa
tāra āge prabhu nācāila bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; haila—there was; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa; rathe—on the car; ārohaṇa—getting up; tāra āge—before it; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nācāila—caused to dance; bhakta-gaṇa—all devotees.
translation: Thus Lord Jagannātha mounted His car, and Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inspired all His devotees to dance in front of it.
